Uses of Interface
fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.PortI

  • Packages that use PortI 
    Package Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.components
    Basic component model.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors
    Hierarchy of connector objects to assemble components.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm
    Component virtual machines for both single computer and distributed deployments.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.forplugins
    Inbound port classes for plug-ins in the basic component model.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.dcc.ports
    Ports for dynamic remote component creation and connection.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.reflection.ports
    Ports for reflection.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Class<?>,java.util.Vector<PortI>> AbstractComponent.interfaces2ports
      a hashtable mapping interfaces implemented by this component to vectors of ports to which one can connect using these interfaces.
      protected java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,PortI> AbstractComponent.portURIs2ports
      a hashtable mapping URIs of ports owned by this component to ports to which one can connect.
      Methods in fr.sorbonne_u.components that return PortI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected PortI AbstractPlugin.findPortFromURI(java.lang.String portURI)
      find a port in the owner component, a method used in plug-in objects to access their owner component in a way other objects can't.
      protected PortI AbstractComponent.findPortFromURI(java.lang.String portURI)
      finds a port of this component from its URI.
      protected PortI[] AbstractComponent.findPortsFromInterface(java.lang.Class<?> inter)
      find the ports of this component that expose the interface inter.
      Methods in fr.sorbonne_u.components with parameters of type PortI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void AbstractPlugin.addPort(PortI p)
      add a port to the owner component, a method used in plug-in objects to access their owner component in a way other objects can't.
      protected void AbstractComponent.addPort(PortI p)
      add a port to the set of ports of this component.
      protected void AbstractComponent.removePort(PortI p)
      remove a port from the set of ports of this component.

      local registry linking port URI to local port objects.
      Methods in fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm that return PortI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PortI AbstractCVM.getFromLocalRegistry(java.lang.String key)
      get the port published under the given key.
      Methods in fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm with parameters of type PortI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void AbstractCVM.localPublishPort(PortI port)
      publish the port in the local registry.
      static void AbstractCVM.localUnpublishPort(PortI port)
      unpublish the port in the local registry.
      protected static void AbstractCVM.publishInLocalRegistry(java.lang.String key, PortI p)
      publish a port in the local registry.
      static void AbstractDistributedCVM.publishPort(PortI port)
      publish inbound ports (data inbound ports and two way ports) both locally and globally, which includes the RMI registry and the global component registry; outbound ports need not be published globally but only locally (this information is used by the connection builder to decide how the connections to that port must be done).
      static void AbstractDistributedCVM.unpublishPort(PortI port)
      unpublish previously published inbound ports (data inbound ports and two way ports) both locally and globally, which includes the RMI registry and the global component registry; outbound ports need not be published globally but only locally.

    • Uses of PortI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports

      Subinterfaces of PortI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataInboundPortI
      The interface DataInboundPortI represents the category of ports used by components exchanging data rather than being called for their services.
      interface  DataOutboundPortI
      The interface DataOutboundPortI represents the category of ports used by components exchanging data rather than calling providers for their services.
      interface  InboundPortI
      The interface InboundPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for incoming calls from client components towards the service providers.
      interface  OutboundPortI
      The interface OutBoundPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for outgoing calls from a component towards its service providers.
      interface  TwoWayPortI<TWI extends TwoWayI>
      The interface TwoWayPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for incoming and outgoing calls among components that act both as clients and service providers towards each others on the same interface.
      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports that implement PortI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDataInboundPort
      The class AbstractDataInboundPort partially implements an inbound port for data exchanging components.
      class  AbstractDataOutboundPort
      The class AbstractDataOutboundPort partially implements an outbound port for data exchanging components.
      class  AbstractDataTwoWayPort
      The class AbstractDataTwoWayPort partially implements a data two-way port for components exchanging data with each others in a peer-to-peer fashion.
      class  AbstractInboundPort
      The class AbstractInboundPort partially implements an inbound port which implements the offered interface of the provider component so that the provider can be called through this port.
      class  AbstractOutboundPort
      The class AbstractOutboundPort partially implements an outbound port which implements the required interface of the owning component so that it can call its providers through this port.
      class  AbstractPort
      The class AbstractPort represents the basic properties and behaviours of ports in the component model.
      class  AbstractTwoWayPort<TWI extends TwoWayI>
      The class AbstractTwoWayPort partially implements a two-way port for components calling each others in a peer-to-peer fashion.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDataInboundPortForPlugin
      The class AbstractDataInboundPortForPlugin extends the standard data inbound port for the case where the pull services to be called is implemented by a plug-in.
      class  AbstractDataOutboundPortForPlugin
      The class AbstractDataOutboundPortForPlugin extends the standard data outbound port for the case where the push services to be called is implemented by a plug-in.
      class  AbstractDataTwoWayPortForPlugin
      The class AbstractDataTwoWayPortForPlugin Description Invariant invariant true Created on : 2018-08-28
      class  AbstractInboundPortForPlugin
      The class AbstractInboundPortForPlugin extends the standard inbound port for the case where the services to be called is implemented by a plug-in.
      class  AbstractTwoWayPortForPlugin<T extends TwoWayI>
      The class AbstractTwoWayPortForPlugin Description Invariant invariant true Created on : 2018-08-28
